meanings: (하고 싶다) (동사로 쓰여) want (to), would like to, wish (to), (formal) desire (to), feel like (doing)
(~한 생각이 들다) (동사로 쓰여) look, seem, appear

meanings.meaning: if the cap fits (, wear it)
if you can't stand the heat (get out of the kitchen)

vlive.korean: 그래서 어느 정도 모았다 싶으면 붓고 도장 찍으면 됩니다! So if you've gotten enough, pour and stamp it! 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: So if you've gotten enough, pour and stamp it!

vlive.korean: 성인이 되고 싶으면... When you become an adult... 듣기 View video X1 : 룸메즈🍒 + a
어느 정도 예쁘게 펴졌다 싶으면... If the tree looks nice... 듣기 View video AB6IX : 메리 영민스마스🎅🎅❤
듣고 싶으면 WOW를 외치세요! If you want to hear it, say "WOW"! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 52 - SPECIAL GUEST
vlive.english: If you want to hear it, say "WOW"!

vlive.korean: [마가 뜬다 싶으면 나오는 비트] - 킬링 - 컴온! Killing. - Come on! 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV6] EP8 머리 어깨 무릎 다 HIP해

examples.korean: I don’t want to be a nuisance so tell me if you want to be alone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 성가시게 하고 싶지 않아. 그러니 네가 혼자 있고 싶으면 내게 말해 줘. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t want to be a nuisance so tell me if you want to be alone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can come too, if you want. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (네가) 원하면[오고 싶으면] 너도 와도 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can come too, if you want. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can take the car, if you want. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러고 싶으면 그 차를 가져[타고] 가도 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can take the car, if you want. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have a tame doctor who’ll always give me a sick note when I want a day off. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내게는 내가 하루 쉬고 싶으면 언제든지 진단서를 끊어줄 말 잘 듣는 의사가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I have a tame doctor who’ll always give me a sick note when I want a day off. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We’ll go for a walk if you feel like it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 그러고 싶으면 우리 산책을 나가도 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’ll go for a walk if you feel like it. Add to Wordbook
